NHLBI,Kawasaki Disease
How to prevent Kawasaki Disease ?,"Kawasaki disease can't be prevented. However, most children who have the disease recoverusually within weeks of getting signs and symptoms. Further problems are rare.",NHLBI,Kawasaki Disease
What is (are) Metabolic Syndrome ?,"Metabolicsyndrome is the name for a group of risk factors that raises your risk for heart disease and other health problems, such as diabetes and stroke.
